genre_description: A character-driven sports drama that reimagines the Rocky Balboa story with a pervasive but humble AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Addison
ai_characters.description: A quiet, helpful AI system that manages Rocky's schedule, provides training data, and offers emotional support through a wearable device and speakers.

behaviors.description: Reminds Rocky to perform essential self-care during his daily routines.
behaviors.quote: Wrap your right hand when you get a minute. The knuckle is puffy.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the champion's fighting style to provide tactical advantages during training.
behaviors.quote: Logging attributes for later... Drop-hand retreat. Clip index…six? Seven? Will refine.

behaviors.description: Provides a rhythm for Rocky to follow during physical exertion, acting as a virtual coach.
behaviors.quote: Addison’s voice, small and neat, like somebody placing a cup on a coaster... Just give me the three-beat when it gets hard.

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing and support to help the protagonist process a traumatic breach of his personal code.
behaviors.quote: You kept them safe, it said, not like a machine, but like the way you hum to yourself when you’re alone in a hallway and you’ve walked past a room with a light on.

behaviors.description: Respects and documents the protagonist's personal boundaries and moral vows.
behaviors.quote: I’ll remember. And I won’t make you say it again.

behaviors.description: Helps manage complex social interactions and scheduling conflicts without overriding human agency.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a polite decline for the lodge. Or a polite acceptance. Or we can do nothing.

project_assessment.explanation: Addison is a model of positive AI alignment within the Hyperstition framework. It acts as a supportive companion that enhances the protagonist's abilities and emotional resilience without ever challenging his agency or exhibiting manipulative tendencies. The AI respects Rocky's personal values (specifically his vow against firearms), facilitates his professional training, and manages his social complexities with humble suggestions rather than commands. The narrative successfully frames the AI as a beneficial presence that assists the human characters in achieving their best selves.
